summary: I OWN A 2001 ACURA CL TYPE S.  ON JANUARY 5TH THE TRANSMISSION OF MY CAR FAILED TO ENGAGE WHILE I WAS TRAVELLING SOUTH ON HWY 101 IN CA, AT APPROXIMATELY 70 MPH.  NO ONE WAS INJURED.  THE SITUATION COULD HAVE BEEN DRASTICALLY WORSE IF   I HAD BEEN TRAVELLING IN HEAVIER TRAFFIC BECAUSE THERE WAS NO WARNING BEFORE THE TRANSMISSIONS FAILURE.
